position_description_html:
Job Description

Duties


Reporting to the General Manager Global program, this role provides high level executive support, program management support and stakeholder liaison.

The role contributes to a small dynamic team that has a mandate to improve the quality, impact and effectiveness of ACIAR’s global stakeholder engagement and communication activities.




Eligibility


Must be an Australian Citizen.

About Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research (ACIAR)

ACIAR is part of Australia’s development assistance program, fostering international agricultural research and development partnerships that will result in more sustainable agricultural systems, higher incomes and strengthened food security, particularly in the Asia–Pacific region. Further information on our current projects and priorities can be found on our website at www.aciar.gov.au.
ACIAR’s headquarters is in Bruce (Canberra) and we offer flexibility in working practices and employment conditions.
position_contact_address: Applicants should email their application to the HR Manager Sharyn.Turner@aciar.gov.au, applications should include: Personal Particulars form, 2 page sales pitch - stating how your skills and experience meet the requirements of the role and CV with 2 professional referees, by the closing date midnight 19 January 2017
notes_html:
Applicants to vacancies notified in all formats of the electronic Public Service Gazette should be aware that;
.  the names of successful applicants may also be notified in all formats of the electronic Public Service Gazette
.  applicants found suitable may be offered similar employment opportunities by other Australian Public Service agencies
This notice is part of the electronic Public Service Gazette PS01-Thu - 05 Jan 2017 Published by Australian Public Service Commission.
agency: Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research (ACIAR)
